name: COR Worldwide Inc.
description: Developer of artificial intelligence-powered management software designed to track time automatically by giving real-time visibility on profits and delays. The company's software automates workflows, and timesheets with pre-loaded project templates that suggest hours, and provide context for every communication, keeping the flow of messages and related files for each task, project, and client, enabling firms to predict profitability, reducing work overload and improve client engagements.
one_liner: Developer of artificial intelligence-powered management software designed to track time automatically by giving real-time visibility on profits and delays. The company's software automates workflows, and timesheets with pre-loaded project templates that suggest hours, and provide context for every communication, keeping the flow of messages and related files for each task, project, and client, enabling firms to predict profitability, reducing work overload and improve client engagements.
